pageData.textContent:
ALEXA IS YOUR VOICE CONCIERGE AT MAVERI, TRY:

Alexa, I've Arrived.

Alexa, where is the business center?

Alexa, how do I connect to the WiFi?

Alexa, what time is check out?

Alexa, play music.

Alexa, tell me about Maveri Rewards.

Alexa, can I get room service?

Alexa, can I get a toothbrush?

Alexa, what amenities are available?

Alexa, I want to order dinner.

Alexa, what time is the gym open?

Alexa, call front desk.

Alexa, request house keeping.

Alexa, how much is my bill?

Alexa, what time is check out?
